summary: After a stray cat adopts Zachary, he meets Marilee and realizes the single life is not as fulfilling as he thought it was.
cast: Brandon Routh|Kimberley Sustad|Stephanie Bennett|Chelsea Hobbs|Sean Tyson|Dalias Blake|Gregory Harrison|Tonya Lee Albers|Alison Araya|Stephen Dimopoulos|Carey Feehan|Nicole Fraissinet|Jennifer Cheon Garcia|Keith Martin Gordey|Kayvon Kelly|Jarrett Knowles|Dominique Lalonde|Marilyn Norry|Giles Panton|Manoj Sood|Barbara Wallace|Isabella Piombini
keywords: christmas romance|orange tabby cat|house flipping|no pets allowed|commitment phobia
title: Un amor con siete vidas
